name: UnifiedAttribute
description: A unified attribute for the Image Checkbox

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the button
default: 30.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the button
default: 30.0

content.name: style__check
content.description:
the style of the checkbox when it is checked
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__uncheck
content.description:
the style of the checkbox when it is not checked
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__check_glow
content.description:
the style of the checkbox when it is checked and glowing
default: the "no image" image

content.name: style__uncheck_glow
content.description:
the style of the checkbox when it is not checked and glowing
default: the "no image" image
